summary: Project focused on fixing critical regressions: chat UI not showing multiple friends; post photos not displaying on feed (only captions show).
architectural_notes: User reported chat UI bug: multiple friends not showing for chat - priority fix.
User reported feed bug: post photos not displaying, only captions show - priority fix.
known_issues: Chat UI is not showing multiple friends for chat functionality.
Post photos are not displaying on feed; only captions are visible.

existing_features.title: Ensure the frontend Delete Account flow successfully calls the backend `deleteAccount` method and fully resets the client session so the user is returned to an unauthenticated/setup state.

Wire the Friends page search UI to call the backend search API with the actual user-entered search string, and display results reliably (including the “No users found” state) without requiring a page refresh.

Fix any frontend hook/API mismatches that currently cause search to return no users (e.g., missing backend method name, not passing the query string into the queryFn/queryKey, or calling a non-existent actor method), and ensure the search feature fails gracefully with an English error toast when the backend method is unavailable.
Fix the frontend FriendsPage to properly display incoming friend requests so users can see and respond to pending requests they have received.
Fix the frontend FriendsPage to properly display outgoing friend requests so users can see pending requests they have sent and cancel them if needed.
Fix the frontend FriendsPage to properly display the user's existing friends list so users can see all their confirmed friendships.
Fix the ChatPage friend list sidebar to correctly display all friends so users can see and select multiple friends for chatting instead of seeing an empty or incomplete list
Fix the FeedPage PostCard component to properly display post images so users can see the photos in posts instead of only seeing captions

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix chat UI so multiple friends show correctly for chat
Fix feed so post photos display correctly (currently only captions show)
